languages.text: "В подобном месте всегда полезно иметь нору, в которую можно забиться и перевязать раны".
"In a place like this, it's always handy to have a hole you can crawl into and patch yourself up."
languages.original_text: "В подобном месте всегда полезно иметь нору, в которую можно забиться и перевязать раны".

traits.locale_text: "In a place like this, it's always handy to have a hole you can crawl into and patch yourself up."
"In a place like this, it's always handy to have a hole you can crawl into and patch yourself up."
"In a place like this, it's always handy to have a hole you can crawl into and patch yourself up."
"In a place like this, it's always handy to have a hole you can crawl into and patch yourself up."
"In a place like this, it's always handy to have a hole you can crawl into and patch yourself up."

languages.text: “在这种地方，能有这么个小窝躲起来休息一下，确实很方便。”
languages.original_text: "In a place like this, it's always handy to have a hole you can crawl into and patch yourself up."

traits.locale_text: “在这种地方，能有这么个小窝躲起来休息一下，确实很方便。”

languages.text: 「こんなところじゃ、もぐり込んで疲れを取るねぐらがあると便利だってのは世の常さ」
languages.original_text: "In a place like this, it's always handy to have a hole you can crawl into and patch yourself up."

traits.locale_text: 「こんなところじゃ、もぐり込んで疲れを取るねぐらがあると便利だってのは世の常さ」

languages.text: « Dans un endroit pareil, il est toujours utile d'avoir un trou où se terrer pour se soigner. »
languages.original_text: "In a place like this, it's always handy to have a hole you can crawl into and patch yourself up."

traits.locale_text: « Dans un endroit pareil, il est toujours utile d'avoir un trou où se terrer pour se soigner. »

languages.text: «En un lugar así, siempre viene bien tener un rincón en el que acurrucarse y curar las heridas».
languages.original_text: "In a place like this, it's always handy to have a hole you can crawl into and patch yourself up."

traits.locale_text: «En un lugar así, siempre viene bien tener un rincón en el que acurrucarse y curar las heridas».

languages.text: "An einem Ort wie diesem ist es immer praktisch, ein Loch zu haben, in das man sich verziehen kann, um sich wieder zusammenzuflicken."
languages.original_text: "In a place like this, it's always handy to have a hole you can crawl into and patch yourself up."

traits.locale_text: "An einem Ort wie diesem ist es immer praktisch, ein Loch zu haben, in das man sich verziehen kann, um sich wieder zusammenzuflicken."

languages.text: "Böyle yerlerde saklanıp toparlanabileceğin bir delik bulmakta fayda vardır."
languages.original_text: "In a place like this, it's always handy to have a hole you can crawl into and patch yourself up."

traits.locale_text: "Böyle bir yerdeyken, saklanıp kendini toparlayabileceğin bir delik bulmak her zaman işe yarar."
